    The beginning of the story is good, but I got tired so the end is a bit 
crappy, and has a lot of mispellings. Sorry. But, I will work on the 
development of these six people. Its long, but try to read it for me. Thanks.


As I have told you before, the swamps that border the Maximal and Predacon 
territory's are some of the most savage and disturbing battlefeilds the Beast 
Wars has seen. But, there is another place, a place some say is far worse 
than the swamps.
    An island, topped with a puffing volcano, lays quiet in an ocean of blue 
green. Uninhabited by any bot, it is almost the last place that animals with 
wings, scales, or fur can find refuge. But, one day that refuge was shattered 
by the arrival of several transformers.
    The pods fell from the sky long ago, during the attempt by the Vok to 
destroy the Beast Wars, and the original Warriors. When the pods fell from 
orbit, several landed on this island, and like they were programmed to do 
they picked beast modes.
    Now, before I get into what beast modes they picked, or what fractions 
they belonged too, I must tell you all about the community these six bots had 
with each other. 
    They emerged in different locations of the island, but after a week or so 
made contact and formed a tribe like community. They fished, hunted, and 
farmed the island. They made homes and lived happily. Everyday was a 
celebration of life and the goals of the islanders was the pursuit or 
happiness. Hate, malice, jealousy, revenge....they were emotions foreign to 
the natives. They only knew laughter, smiles, and togetherness. Nothing 
seperated anyone. They were brothers and sisters.
    All that ended on horrible, bloody afternoon after months of peace and 
happiness....

    Nighteyes made her way through the trail back to camp after spending the 
morning watching the dolphins. Her greatest joy was sitting in the shade, and 
listening to there mysterious speech. But, she had chores to do.
    Her beast mode, a black panther, was perfect for rampageing through the 
forest quickly. It scared any unwanted predators away from camp.
    The camp itself was a clearing on the beach made out of trees. Paddletail 
was the main builder, and engineer. He constructed everything. A mathematical 
genius he was easily the smartest on the island.
    Nighteyes entered the camp. Guanatix was sunning herself on a large rock. 
The iguna was very quiet, she was the philosopher. Always questioning why 
thery were here, and most importantly what the strange degins on there chests 
were. No one knew what the red wolf like, or the purple insect like designs 
ment.
    Grappler was helping paddletail with the construction of the new main 
hall. The old one had fallen apart durring a storm. His Tarantula beast mode 
allowed him to rig up pullies and ropes.
    Aquarious, the dolphin, was the only one would had to sleep in an 
underwater cave. He could stray to far from the ocean, or risk death. He 
always talked to everyone. Always happy. Always. That was his attitude, very 
positive.
    Finally, making her way through the camp, she came to Aerostreak. He was 
a bird, a halwk. He was the main hunter of the group. The hawlk had an 
expression on his face that Nighteyes always saw in the predators when they 
tried to attack the camp. THis was the only one of her brothers and sisters 
she was uneasy around, and he knew it.
    "Good moring sister. I trust you enjoyed your afternoon. Playing with the 
dolphins?" She said, in his beast mode, glareing.
    Nighteyes transformed. "Yes. I had a wonderful time. And how was your 
morning spent?"
    He made a kind of sneer that Nighteyes took as him saying in body 
language, "Why would you care?" But, what he truly said, "I found this in the 
water. Aquarious tried to keep it. I told him he couldnt because it was to 
valuable."
    Nighteyes didnt see why it was so important. It was a silver box with 
somekind of speaker face on it. They saw something like this once before in 
the stasis pods. But they washed away long ago...
    "Its mine. And Paddletail says he can get it working. And then mabey we 
wil lfind others." The bird said, holding the box in his claw.
    Nighteyes hated when Aerostreak talked about 'others'. She didnt want to 
meet anyone else. She was happy here. But, Aerostreak always wanted to get 
off the island.
    Before Nighteyes could respond, Paddletail came over. The beaver was 
wise, and could fix it. He looked it over, and useing some of the instruments 
he created, tinkered with the box. Its insides were very odd, but paddletail 
loved the challenge. After several hours, and complaining from Aerostreak, he 
got it working. It was a radio.
    "I told you it was important! And listen! Someone is talking! Everyone, 
gather here!" He squaked, now transformed.
    The three others came and sat, and listened. Whoever was talking was 
loud, and in Nighteyes opinion mean. His name was Hell Beast. He was talking 
to someone named Jackle and Gremlin. the names Maimal and Predacon kept 
coming up. They natives glaced at each other in puzzlement. The conversation 
wnet on about how the Maximals had destroyed a Predacon concentration camp on 
Vegas 9. 
    Nighteyes didnt understand. But, Aerostreak seemed to know what was 
happening. He kept interrupting, saying how these Predacons were good hunters.
    The conversation went on and on. It seemed endless. But, finally, the 
radio went into static.
    "Predacons. It has a nice ring to it. Those Maximals are the enemy. I 
belive I am a Predacon." The hawlk said, looking at his symbol that suddenly 
glowed with an affirmative response, as did Grappler and Guanatix.
    "Wait, we dont belong to them! They want to fight, and kill!" Nighteyes 
said.
    "Your Maximals! Aquarious, Paddletail, and you, Nighteyes, your our 
enemy!" Grappler roared.
    Nighteyes had never seen such hatred before. And then, a new sensation 
filled her. And she realized for the first time she had a pistol stoed away 
in her leg. She pulled it out, as did the five others.
    Aerostreak took charge of brother Grappler and sister Gunantix. Nighteyes 
led Aquarious and Paddletail. They ran, for cover. And thats when there world 
was shattered. The sound of happiness was filled with gunfire. Birds took 
off, the animals fled. That day would last forever in Nighteyes 
memory.........

    Months had past since that day. Nighteyes, Aquarious, and Paddletail had 
made it to the mainland on a raft. Now, they had to find there family. There 
kind. The Maximals. As for the three Predacons, they left days before the 
Maximals had, and there whereabouts were unknown.
